name: color-picker
description:
[![Waffle.io Columns and their card count](https://badge.waffle.io/Salamandastron1/palette-picker.svg?columns=all)](https://waffle.io/Salamandastron1/palette-picker)
Palette Picker lets you sort through the colors of the rainbow to find pleasing combinations. Lock colors that you like until you pick a perfectly presented palette.
